resources.string:
Welcome to App Shortcuts Library!

This is an Open Source library and available on GitHub.

The shorctus have a features of Android 7.1 Nougat, and available only for the launcher that implement, in this library, you can implement in your launcher shorctus starting from API 14!

This library is under Apache v2 License, and all right reserved to Michele Lacorte.

If you like this library please help developer and Donate.

App Version v1.1

Library Version v1.1.0
